Text: Sarah Bolger:  She is best known for her roles in the films "In America", "Stormbreaker", and "The Spiderwick Chronicles", as well as her award-winning role as Lady Mary Tudor in the TV series "The Tudors", and for guest starring as Princess Aurora in "Once Upon a Time".
